quote: If you have only one smile in you give it to the people you love.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you.
author: A. A. Milne

quote: All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn't hurt.
author: Charles M. Schulz

quote: For it was not into my ear you whispered, but into my heart. It was not my lips you kissed, but my soul.
author: Judy Garland

quote: Love is our true destiny. We do not find the meaning of life by ourselves alone - we find it with another.
author: Thomas Merton

quote: They invented hugs to let people know you love them without saying anything.
author: Bil Keane

quote: We are most alive when we're in love.
author: John Updike

quote: The heart has its reasons of which reason knows nothing.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: Love will find a way through paths where wolves fear to prey.
author: Lord Byron

quote: A heart is not judged by how much you love, but by how much you are loved by others.
author: Frank Morgan

quote: The minute I heard my first love story, I started looking for you, not knowing how blind that was. Lovers don't finally meet somewhere. They're in each other all along.
author: Rumi

quote: A friendship that like love is warm; A love like friendship, steady.
author: Thomas Moore

quote: Where there is great love, there are always wishes.
author: Willa Cather

quote: A kiss makes the heart young again and wipes out the years.
author: Rupert Brooke

quote: Love shall be our token; love be yours and love be mine.
author: Christina Rossetti

quote: Doubt thou the stars are fire, Doubt that the sun doth move. Doubt truth to be a liar, But never doubt I love.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: How did it happen that their lips came together? How does it happen that birds sing, that snow melts, that the rose unfolds, that the dawn whitens behind the stark shapes of trees on the quivering summit of the hill? A kiss, and all was said.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: I know of only one duty, and that is to love.
author: Albert Camus

quote: The hours I spend with you I look upon as sort of a perfumed garden, a dim twilight, and a fountain singing to it. You and you alone make me feel that I am alive. Other men it is said have seen angels, but I have seen thee and thou art enough.
author: George Edward Moore

quote: This is love: to fly toward a secret sky, to cause a hundred veils to fall each moment. First to let go of life. Finally, to take a step without feet.
author: Rumi

quote: Soul meets soul on lovers' lips.
author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quote: If you press me to say why I loved him, I can say no more than because he was he, and I was I.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: When you love someone all your saved up wishes start coming out.
author: Elizabeth Bowen

quote: I'd rather have roses on my table than diamonds on my neck.
author: Emma Goldman

quote: You are always new, the last of your kisses was ever the sweetest.
author: John Keats

quote: There's a long life ahead of you and it's going to be beautiful, as long as you keep loving and hugging each other.
author: Yoko Ono

quote: I do not want horses or diamonds - I am happy in possessing you.
author: Clara Schumann

quote: Now a soft kiss - Aye, by that kiss, I vow an endless bliss.
author: John Keats

quote: Today is Valentine's Day - or, as men like to call it, Extortion Day!
author: Jay Leno

quote: Each time you love, love as deeply as if it were forever.
author: Audre Lorde

quote: Give me a kiss, and to that kiss a score; Then to that twenty, add a hundred more: A thousand to that hundred: so kiss on, To make that thousand up a million. Treble that million, and when that is done, Let's kiss afresh, as when we first begun.
author: Robert Herrick

quote: I'll love you, dear, I'll love you till China and Africa meet and the river jumps over the mountain and the salmon sing in the street.
author: W. H. Auden

quote: The best smell in the world is that man that you love.
author: Jennifer Aniston

quote: Romance is thinking about your significant other, when you are supposed to be thinking about something else.
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: Oh, if it be to choose and call thee mine, love, thou art every day my Valentine!
author: Thomas Hood

quote: I got a Valentine's Day card from my girl. It said, 'Take my heart! Take my arms! Take my lips!' Which is just like her. Keeping the best part for herself.
author: Robert Orben

quote: It is the passion that is in a kiss that gives to it its sweetness; it is the affection in a kiss that sanctifies it.
author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quote: The Eskimos had fifty-two names for snow because it was important to them: there ought to be as many for love.
author: Margaret Atwood

quote: In love there are two things - bodies and words.
author: Joyce Carol Oates

quote: Kisses are a better fate than wisdom.
author: e. e. cummings

quote: Love is when the desire to be desired takes you so badly that you feel you could die of it.
author: Henri de Toulouse-Lautrec

quote: So, fall asleep love, loved by me... for I know love, I am loved by thee.
author: Robert Browning

quote: I'd kiss a frog even if there was no promise of a Prince Charming popping out of it. I love frogs.
author: Cameron Diaz

quote: I love Valentine's Day! I love it, I love it, I love it. I like having doors opened for me. My favorite romantic comedy is 'When Harry Met Sally.'
author: Ginnifer Goodwin

quote: I love bringing roses to a woman when she least expects it.
author: Esai Morales

quote: I'm like the kid in kindergarten; I really do send valentines to everyone.
author: Susie Bright

quote: Everything's coming up roses - for me.
author: Ethel Merman

quote: Look, there's no metaphysics on earth like chocolates.
author: Fernando Pessoa

quote: I love romance. I'm a sucker for it. I love it so much. It's pathetic.

quote: This is love: to fly toward a secret sky, to cause a hundred veils to fall each moment. First to let go of life. Finally, to take a step without feet.
author: Rumi

quote: Soul meets soul on lovers' lips.

quote: When you love someone all your saved up wishes start coming out.

quote: I'd rather have roses on my table than diamonds on my neck.

quote: If you have only one smile in you give it to the people you love.

quote: If you have only one smile in you give it to the people you love.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you.
author: A. A. Milne

quote: All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn't hurt.
author: Charles M. Schulz

quote: For it was not into my ear you whispered, but into my heart. It was not my lips you kissed, but my soul.
author: Judy Garland

quote: Love is our true destiny. We do not find the meaning of life by ourselves alone - we find it with another.
author: Thomas Merton

quote: They invented hugs to let people know you love them without saying anything.
author: Bil Keane

quote: We are most alive when we're in love.
author: John Updike

quote: The heart has its reasons of which reason knows nothing.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: Love will find a way through paths where wolves fear to prey.
author: Lord Byron

quote: A heart is not judged by how much you love, but by how much you are loved by others.
author: Frank Morgan

quote: The minute I heard my first love story, I started looking for you, not knowing how blind that was. Lovers don't finally meet somewhere. They're in each other all along.
author: Rumi

quote: A friendship that like love is warm; A love like friendship, steady.
author: Thomas Moore

quote: Where there is great love, there are always wishes.
author: Willa Cather

quote: A kiss makes the heart young again and wipes out the years.
author: Rupert Brooke

quote: Love shall be our token; love be yours and love be mine.
author: Christina Rossetti

quote: Doubt thou the stars are fire, Doubt that the sun doth move. Doubt truth to be a liar, But never doubt I love.
author: William Shakespeare

author: Victor Hugo

quote: I know of only one duty, and that is to love.
author: Albert Camus

quote: A heart is not judged by how much you love, but by how much you are loved by others.
author: Frank Morgan

quote: The minute I heard my first love story, I started looking for you, not knowing how blind that was. Lovers don't finally meet somewhere. They're in each other all along.
author: Rumi

quote: A friendship that like love is warm; A love like friendship, steady.
author: Thomas Moore

quote: Where there is great love, there are always wishes.
author: Willa Cather

quote: A kiss makes the heart young again and wipes out the years.
author: Rupert Brooke

quote: Love shall be our token; love be yours and love be mine.
author: Christina Rossetti

quote: Doubt thou the stars are fire, Doubt that the sun doth move. Doubt truth to be a liar, But never doubt I love.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: How did it happen that their lips came together? How does it happen that birds sing, that snow melts, that the rose unfolds, that the dawn whitens behind the stark shapes of trees on the quivering summit of the hill? A kiss, and all was said.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: I know of only one duty, and that is to love.
author: Albert Camus

quote: The hours I spend with you I look upon as sort of a perfumed garden, a dim twilight, and a fountain singing to it. You and you alone make me feel that I am alive. Other men it is said have seen angels, but I have seen thee and thou art enough.
author: George Edward Moore

quote: This is love: to fly toward a secret sky, to cause a hundred veils to fall each moment. First to let go of life. Finally, to take a step without feet.
author: Rumi

quote: Soul meets soul on lovers' lips.
author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quote: If you press me to say why I loved him, I can say no more than because he was he, and I was I.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: When you love someone all your saved up wishes start coming out.
author: Elizabeth Bowen

quote: I'd rather have roses on my table than diamonds on my neck.
author: Emma Goldman

quote: You are always new, the last of your kisses was ever the sweetest.
author: John Keats

quote: There's a long life ahead of you and it's going to be beautiful, as long as you keep loving and hugging each other.
author: Yoko Ono

quote: If you have only one smile in you give it to the people you love.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you.
author: A. A. Milne

quote: All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn't hurt.
author: Charles M. Schulz

quote: For it was not into my ear you whispered, but into my heart. It was not my lips you kissed, but my soul.
author: Judy Garland

quote: Love is our true destiny. We do not find the meaning of life by ourselves alone - we find it with another.
author: Thomas Merton

quote: They invented hugs to let people know you love them without saying anything.
author: Bil Keane

quote: We are most alive when we're in love.
author: John Updike

quote: The heart has its reasons of which reason knows nothing.
author: Blaise Pascal
